summary: Adds a few new enchantments which can automagically cast specific spells when entering combat or when hit by magic.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][size=5][b]Spell Trigger Enchantments[/b][/size]

Adds a few new enchantments which can automagically cast specific spells when entering combat or when hit by magic.
[/size][size=4]
There are eight new different enchantments in total:

[list]
[*][size=4][b]Light Guard[/b] cast Candle Light when entering combat[/size]
[*][size=4][b]Oak Guard[/b] cast Oak Flesh when entering combat[/size]
[*][size=4][b][size=4][size=4][b]Stone Guard[/b] [/size][/size][/b][size=4][size=4]cast Stone Flesh when entering combat[/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=4][/size][size=4][size=4][b]Iron Guard[/b] cast Iron Flesh when entering combat[/size][/size]
[/list][size=4][size=4]
[/size][/size][list]
[*][size=4][b]Wrath of Fire[/b] higher chance of scoring critical hits for a short time when hit by magic fire[/size]
[*][size=4][b][size=4][size=4][b]Wrath of Winter[/b][/size][/size][/b][size=4][size=4] attacks do more damage for a short time when hit by magic frost[/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=4][b]Wrath of Storm[/b] increased attack speed for a short time when hit hit by magic lightning[/size]
[*][b][size=4]Elemental Wrath[/size][/b][size=4] all the wrath enchantments combined in one[/size][b][size=4][/size][/b]
[/list][/size][size=4]
[size=4]Starting at level 5 the enchantments can be found on items worn by dungeon bosses around Skyrim.[/size]
[size=4][size=4]
All items except the Ring of Elemental Wrath can be disenchanted[/size] and the enchantments can then be placed on most equipment.[/size]

When equipped the enchantments will work for everyone: the player, followers and of course dungeon bosses too...


[b]MOD status:[/b][size=4] (mostly)[/size] finished
[b]Cleaned:[/b] yes[b]
Script load:[/b] low
[b]Compatibility:[/b] high
[b]Dependencies:[/b] skyrim.esm
I[b]nstall/Uninstall:[/b] Anytime except during combat when the Storm Guard spell is active. So don't save during combat or don't uninstall this mod and there should be no problems.


[b]Random Notes:[/b][/size]

[list]
[*][size=4]This MOD aims at improving both dungeon loot and boss fights by placing the enchanted items on the boss and not in the chest.[/size]
[*][size=4]The most powerful Elemental Wrath ring drops at level 50+.[/size]
[*][size=4]If you don't like to 'grind' dungeons to get the items you can just add the rings through console commands as usual.[/size]
[*][size=4][size=4]The enchantments work best for melee characters. Especially if you have a mage follower who likes to spam Chain Lightnings. ( Serana? I'm looking at you... )[/size][/size]
[/list]
author: TheSecretMaster
